text: Heteroflexibility is a kind of sexual or romantic orientation characterized by mostly heterosexual attraction to the opposite sex or gender with occasional homosexual attraction to the same sex or gender. It is described as "mostly straight". It falls under the bisexual umbrella term. Some heteroflexibles identify as a straight ally and/or heterosexual. ==Related pages== * Bi- curious * Homoflexibility, the opposite of heteroflexible ==References== Category:Bisexuality
title: Heteroflexiblity
